effect.scarlet_violet: Raises the user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each. Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
effect.the_teal_mask: Raises the user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each. Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Raises the user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each. Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
